meanings.definition: The fish population in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyofauna in the lake includes various types of fish.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the ichthyofauna in the river to understand its diversity.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyofauna in the pond decided to throw a party for all the other aquatic creatures.
meanings.sent4: The ichthyofauna in the ocean danced gracefully in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ichthyofauna in the aquarium captivated the visitors.

meanings.definition: The study of fish species in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: Marine biologists conduct research on the ichthyofauna of coral reefs.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the ichthyofauna of a lake helps in conservation efforts.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyofauna class at the university always smells like fish.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the ichthyofauna of the deep sea is like discovering a hidden world.
meanings.sent5: The book on ichthyofauna provided valuable insights into fish diversity.
